summary.description: A brief one-line or two-line summary of the repository contents and their suitability as example code.

has_tests.description: Indicates if this repository mentions running code tests.

level_of_detail.description: Rate the level of detail of the README on a scale from 1-10

is_application.description: Indicates if this repository is a standalone application.

is_samples.description: Indicates if this repository includes a set of samples of example code.

service_names.description: An array of AWS services mentioned in the README.
